objects.text:
• 50MP Pro-Grade Camera
• 8K Video Recording
• Powerful Galaxy AI
• Unlocked, 256GB Storage

product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium smartphone advertisement with a clean and modern composition. It features a high-resolution product image ("product_image") of a smartphone on the right, partially overlapping into the text zone to emphasize the design. The background ("background") uses soft geometric gradients and translucent circles in desaturated tones to add depth without distractions. The headline ("heading") is bold and dark for strong visibility, while the subheadline ("subheading") in blue highlights the key feature. A concise feature list ("description") adds tech specs. The price ("price") is prominently featured in large typography, accompanied by a distinct call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #1B1D52
- Royal Blue: #4B5EFC
- Cool Gray: #F2F2F7
- Soft Gray: #E2E2E7
- Charcoal: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek smartphone with a minimalistic, modern color palette focusing on metallic silver (#D9D9D9) and matte gray (#E5E5E5) for the body. The screen features a soft, glowing blend of pale yellow (#F6EFA4), warm gray (#BFBFBF), and white highlights (#FFFFFF). These colors provide a luxurious and futuristic vibe. The dark elements like the camera lens and screen border are in deep black (#1C1C1C), adding contrast and drawing attention to hardware features. This subtle mix of light and shadow textures creates depth, making each color stand out while blending seamlessly for a sophisticated aesthetic.
